attributes.action: review the penalty points system and replace it with a fine only levy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to bring us inline with our european counterparts, Scrap the penalty point system, this will benifit the government two fold. If a driver is banned you cant fine him for speeding etc, secondly you would have less strain on the magistraits courts system as fewer people would counterclaim speeding fines. Most do when they are at the limit of their points. This system has not been reviewed for decades. Instigate a fairer penalty system speed and finance related.
